metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1410 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability.Grafana had a stored XSS vulnerability in the Graphite FunctionDescriptiontooltip. The stored XSS vulnerability was possible due the value of theFunction Description was not properly sanitized. An attacker needs to havecontrol over the Graphite data source in order to manipulate a functiondescription and a Grafana admin needs to configure the data source, later aGrafana user needs to select a tampered function and hover over thedescription. Users may upgrade to version 8.5.22, 9.2.15 and 9.3.11 toreceive a fix.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
